long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Fast Search allows you search X amount of items (up to 10 items) at the same time! Also allows you to select a text and immediately goes straight to Amazon web search with the selected item!

Permissions used:

Tabs: Allows when you click the search button it will open X amount of tabs with all the items you wished to search for.

Storage: Allows you to add items and close the extension so the next time you open the extension all the items would be saved.

Context Menu: Allows you to select text in the page and you can right click to jump straight to the Amazon search engine.

Issues? 
Comment below.
